titleStmt.title: The Kings Maiesties declaration to both houses of Parliament (which he likewise recommends to the consideration of all his loving subjects) in answer to that declaration presented to him by both Houses of Parliament at Newmarket, the 9th of March, 1641.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: print show-through; cropped with loss of print on last page.
